page.title: 17KINGSCLERE SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: Kingsclere has a men's{football}club. The first team plays on Saturday afternoons, and the second team plays on Sunday mornings in the winter. The{cricket}team plays on Saturday afternoons and the matches usually go on into the evenings. They play evening games during the week. Cricket has been played in Kingsclere for over two hundred years. The{bowling}green is next to the cricket pitch. It is very popular with the people who live in Kingsclere.They have just laid a new green. The{tennis}courts are on the other side of the cricket field. The tennis club has two hard courts which can be used all the year round. There are{badminton}and{rugby}clubs which do not have pitches in the village but have to go elsewhere to play their matches.
